category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IC_baseline_carry_forward_active_changes
preference.preference_description: Determines if active changes are carried forward when the user creates an incremental change baseline. An active change is one which is currently effective or may be effective in the future. Valid Values: True - Carry over active changes when creating an incremental change baseline. False - Do not carry over active changes when creating an incremental change baseline.
